metadata.title: CVE-2012-4460 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The serializing/deserializing functions in the qpid::framing::Buffer classin Apache Qpid 0.20 and earlier allow remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (assertion failure and daemon exit) via unspecified vectors. NOTE:this issue could also trigger an out-of-bounds read, but it might nottrigger a crash.

criterions.comment: qpid-cpp package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
